entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 19.
